inlineContent.text: Arranges child controls into a tabbed view, creating a tab for each one. The active tab’s corresponding control is made visible, while all other child controls are hidden. Ignores non-control children.
The drawing of the clickable tabs is handled by this node;
This object emits the following signals:

abstract.text: A container that creates a tab for each child control, displaying only the active tab’s control.
A control that provides a horizontal bar with tabs.
